Sentencas: In this paper, combined heat and power frameworks employing solid oxide fuel cell power module and a small-scale gas turbine are presented.
Titulo: Carbon monoxide reduction in solid oxide fuel cell-mini gas turbine hybrid power system

Sentencas: The offered system is utilized as heat and power supply for residential consumers with a carbon dioxide sorption circulating fluidized bed.
Titulo: Carbon monoxide reduction in solid oxide fuel cell-mini gas turbine hybrid power system

Sentencas: As well a favorable solution for the high penalties associated with CO2 capture and reuse of the CO contents is offered.
Titulo: Carbon monoxide reduction in solid oxide fuel cell-mini gas turbine hybrid power system

Sentencas: The combined heat and power system considered by a different arrangement in order to high proficiency, controllability, heat recovery and high capacity of energy.
Titulo: Carbon monoxide reduction in solid oxide fuel cell-mini gas turbine hybrid power system

Sentencas: In the proposed system, the unburned product from the solid oxide fuel cell is re-extracted and utilized as a fuel source.
Titulo: Carbon monoxide reduction in solid oxide fuel cell-mini gas turbine hybrid power system

Sentencas: The suggested system is analyzed by the first and second law of thermodynamics.
Titulo: Carbon monoxide reduction in solid oxide fuel cell-mini gas turbine hybrid power system

Sentencas: During this study, comprehensive calculations of chemistry and thermal within the fuel cell are performed to get accurate results.
Titulo: Carbon monoxide reduction in solid oxide fuel cell-mini gas turbine hybrid power system

Sentencas: The impact of various parameters, for example fuel and oxidant rate, carbon dioxide removal, operating pressure, compressor parameter on work and heat output of the cycle as well as the discharge of carbon dioxide contamination, is investigated.
Titulo: Carbon monoxide reduction in solid oxide fuel cell-mini gas turbine hybrid power system

Sentencas: The optimal pressure ratio of the compressor to minimize the carbon dioxide production is found.
